Container:
qbittorrent-prometheus-exporter martabal/qbitorrent-prometheus:latest https://github.com/martabal/qbittorrent-prometheus/ bridge
sh false https://github.com/martabal/qbittorrent-prometheus/
A prometheus exporter for qBittorrent.

<Config Name="qBittorrent URL" Target="QBITTORRENT_BASE_URL" Default="" Mode="" Description="http://:" Type="Variable" Display="always" Required="false" Mask="false"> admin adminadmin 8090
